title: Here's Why Zohran Mamdani's Calling for a Starbucks Boycott
description: Zohran Mamdani urges a Starbucks boycott as baristas launch a nationwide strike over stalled contract negotiations, expanding pickets and pressuring the company.
content: Starbucks has been thrust into a nationwide standoff as baristas launch an open-ended strike, and New York City mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani is urging customers to stay away from the chain until a cont… [+3962 chars]
